title: Only three countries didn't sign the Paris Accord.
body:
Nicaragua, because they said they had better plans to combat global warming. Fair reasoning.
Syria, because of the civil war. Fair reasoning.
The Holy See (The Vatican) because they're not even a country, really, so they can't sign. Fair reasoning.

All across the world there is nary a single country that didn't sign the Agreement.

And in walks Donald J Dipshit and goes "Yes I understand we make the second highest levels of carbon emissions in the world, but we're leaving the Agreement. Everyone can suck my dick AND GLOBAL WARMING DOESN'T EXIST!"

Thanks, America. You're really dropping the ball on this one.
